Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horses
lead_paragraph: Mr. Croll was a Hall of Fame trainer who won the 1987 Belmont Stakes with Bet Twice and trained four thoroughbred champions.
snippet: Mr. Croll was a Hall of Fame trainer who won the 1987 Belmont Stakes with Bet Twice and trained four thoroughbred champions.
